title: SE Rechargeable Illuminated Seam Ripper
features: USE: Bring convenience to your sewing by providing direct light when removing stitches
INCLUDES: Rechargeable 501015 battery; USB charging cable
CHARGE TIME: 30 minutes to full charge
description: This rechargeable illuminated seam ripper from Sona Enterprises makes removing stitches quicker and easier. Using this convenient seam ripper helps reduce strain on your eyes by providing light right on the seams without damaging the fabric. Take your stitching and fabrics to the next level with this must-have tool and sewing accessory, whether you are a new or experienced crafter, tailor, or seamstress.
